movie_title: The amazing ways plants defend themselves - Valentin Hammoudi
introduction:
Check out our Patreon page: https://www.patreon.com/teded

View full lesson: https://ed.ted.com/less

vocabulary.definition: to drive or force back; to resist effectively
vocabulary.example: The citronella plant releases a strong scent to repel mosquitoes.

vocabulary.definition: substances formed by the combination of two or more elements
vocabulary.example: The peppermint plant contains compounds that give it its distinct aroma.

vocabulary.definition: not allowing fluids to pass through
vocabulary.example: The thick skin of the avocado is impermeable to water.
The aloe vera plant dispenses a gel that is soothing for sunburns.

vocabulary.definition: a sensory receptor that responds to mechanical pressure or distortion
vocabulary.example: Carnivorous plants have mechanoreceptors that trigger the closure of their traps.

vocabulary.definition: to isolate or restrict the movement of individuals to prevent the spread of disease
vocabulary.example: The infected plants were put under quarantine to prevent the disease from spreading.
